entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having a terrible smile and red eyes that are blank and pitiless. He is the main character of the story.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail's body was ill adapted for possession, but he was able to follow Voldemort's instructions to return him to a rudimentary body. He is described as a poor wizard.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is a snake that provided venom for a potion concocted by Voldemort. She is referred to as his dear Nagini.

relationships.description: Voldemort possessed Wormtail's body, but it was ill adapted for possession. However, he was able to follow Voldemort's instructions.
Nagini provided venom for a potion concocted by Voldemort, which helped him return to an almost human form.
